listitem.para: Opens the file named filename for reading. The read position is initially at the beginning of the file.
The filename can also be the reserved word "clipboard to read data from the clipboard just like a file.

The binarymode is a boolean value (TRUE or FALSE). If binarymode is FALSE or not given, then the file will be read as a text file. That is, the end-of-line sequence will be converted from CRLF to LF. If binarymode is TRUE, then the file will be read as a binary file. That is, no end-of-line sequence conversion will be performed.

listitem.programlisting:
OPENWRITE "dummy.fil SETWRITE "dummy.fil PRINT "Hello PRINT [Good Bye] SETWRITE [] CLOSE "dummy.fil
OPENREAD "dummy.fil SETREAD "dummy.fil REPEAT 2 [SHOW READLIST] [Hello] [Good Bye] SETREAD [] CLOSE "dummy.fil
